title: 05/07/21 DPS Hour 1
itunes:title: 05/07/21 DPS Hour 1
description:
Dan is talking about his interview with Adam Schefter about his non-breaking news at the draft about Aaron Rodgers. Adam told Dan that the Rodgers news was not new but it was an accumulation of speculation and information.
